Posts.Content: For the neuropathy try selenium.  I had the neuropathy bad and it really helped me.  As far as the hair, it has been two years for me and my hair is exactly like the others described, like a thinning balding man.  I'm going to try a bunch of vitamins and oils and I'll let everyone know the outcome.
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
